title: Should I buy an iPhone 11 Pro Max this June or wait for the iPhone 12 Pro? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well if you’re fine with having your current phone for a little longer then go ahead and keep it and see if you like the 12 (or whatever it will be called) if you don’t like it, then you buy the 11 pro at a reduced cost but if you do like it then go ahead and buy it.
